content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems GmbH (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"), whose principal office is at Friedrich-Ebert-Anlage 49, 60308 Frankfurt am Main, Germany, is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal data. We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain individual information about you that identifies or makes you identifiable (\\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"personal information\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\").\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you is processed and the means we use to carry out such processing activities. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We may update this notice from time to time, whenever this is required due to changes of our processing operations or changes in legal requirements. We will notify you of any changes to the privacy notice, e.g., by posting an updated notice to the intranet.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
